place.name: LLYWEL
place.gazetteerText: Llywell, par. and vil., Brecknockshire, on river Usk - par., 22,295 ac., pop. 1259; the vil. is 12 miles W. of Brecknock. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
